item.title: Useitem with item?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Eh, happened once before, DanieB figured out a fix for me, but when I re-made my server, it didn’t work again. Anyways, all my codes are right, they just don’t work.

(Example code):

				else if(itemUsed == 1785 && useWith == 1775)
				{
                                deleteItem(1775,getItemSlot(1775), 1);
                                addItem(6667, 1);
				}
				else if(itemUsed == 1775 && useWith == 1785)
				{
                                deleteItem(1775,getItemSlot(1775), 1);
                                addItem(6667, 1);
				}

I KNOW that code would normally work, just posting it for people who don’t believe me.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 06:02:48 PM[/size][hr]Up.
